title: The schools are still open
selftext:
In this letter the municipal community has given strick orders for red alert in thane area. But still a very reputable and a respectable school  which ranks 2 all over India and 1 all over maharashtra is  going against the letter of thane collectors officer. The scenario is in mumbai is  we have red alert from 20th july till 24 th july and today the date is 21 of july but the school has decided to call the children still in school and make them study whereas the other schools have decided to give holiday. The N L dalmia high school of mira road had given holiday on 20th of july but on 21st they have not given whereas as other schools have already given holiday on the night of 20th of july.
This clearly tell that the school doesn't seems to respect the letter of the muncipal officer and even doest respect the government of maharastra.
